name: Dark OneTab
additional_info:
1. Type about:config in to the address bar, search for 'xpinstall.signatures.required' 
─ right click ─ toggle and set to (false). This will allow you to modify extensions.

2. Navigate to 
%APPDATA%\Mozilla\Firefox\Profiles\8siiww2f.dev-edition-default\extensions

3. Look for the OneTab Extension ─ extension@one-tab.com.xpi

4. Close Firefox.

5. Rename ─> extension@one-tab.com.xpi >> extension@one-tab.com.xpi.zip

6. Open extension@one-tab.com.zip

7. Extract ─> onetab.css ─ from the zip file.

8. Edit the onetab.css file ─ Paste the CSS Code below into the beginning of the file.

9. Drag the ─ onetab.css file ─ back in to the  extension@one-tab.com.zip archive.

10. Rename ─> extension@one-tab.com.xpi.zip >> extension@one-tab.com.xpi

discussions.name: digital signature failure after modifying xpi
digital signature failure after modifying xpi
'xpinstall.signatures.required' ─ Set False or it won't work.
